Description:
The element content is free-form and of the data type
        specified by the dtype attribute.  If this value is selected,
        then the dtype attribute MUST be set.

The element content describes a Common Platform
        Enumeration (CPE) entry per [[NIST.CPE]].

The element content describes a software identification
        (SWID) tag per [ISO19770].

A value used to indicate that this attribute is
        extended and the actual value is provided using the
        corresponding ext-* attribute.  See Section 5.1.1 of [RFC7970].
